mapper.insert: insert into doctor (doctor_name, doctor_department, doctor_position, doctor_gender, doctor_tel, password,cert_code,type,active,create_date) values (#{doctor_name}, #{doctor_department}, #{doctor_position}, #{doctor_gender}, #{doctor_tel}, #{password},#{cert_code},'1','N',NOW())
mapper.select: select count(doctor_id) from doctor where active=#{active};
